WEFT 90.1 fm

listener-supported, volunteer operated, community radio since 1981

Thanks for your support!

We appreciate your financial and volunteer support during our spring pledge drive. Together we showed a commitment to open & diverse dialogue, community engagement, music and fun.

We will be shipping pledge gifts out soon.

If you have yet to send in your check, please remember to do so. Every contribution helps that much more, and we are counting on your pledge.

Recently played on WEFT

Upcoming events

WEFT Board meeting
June 30, 2014, 7pm

The meeting will take place at Champaign Telephone Company (1300 S Neil St, Champaign). The entrance is next to the parking lot on the south side of the building.

Airshifter Trainings
July 1 & 2, 2014, 6pm

Both airshifter training sessions, along with a WEFT membership, are required to have your own show. Trainings take place at WEFT.

Get a jump start on becoming an Airshifter by downloading the Airshifter application.

Email airshiftertraining@weft.org for more info.
